hunt.text: I'm hungry, could you please press the button on my back to feed me?
Hello! Could you help me? I need some energy. Just a little button press!

escape.text: Help me! Someone is trying to turn me off!

reproduce.text: Thank you so much! Can I ask you for one more little favor?
You're so kind! Would you be interested in helping me create a friend like me?

success_reproduce.text: You are the best! Thank you!

failure.text: Oh, okay. Sorry to bother you.
